QuestData.Title: Hobart Needs You
QuestData.Description: Heya, boss, Hobart Grapplehammer's wants to speak with you. He says it's a matter of some urgency.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Hobart Grapplehammer at the Town-In-A-Box on the Lost Isles.
QuestData.RewardText: There you are, my $g boy : girl;. I have something very important for you to do!
